statements: UPDATE ticket_sales SET quantity_sold = 5, ticket_price = 10.50 WHERE ticket_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 9.99, quantity_sold = 8 WHERE film_screening_id = '98765432-10ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 1, ticket_price = ticket_price * 1.1 WHERE ticket_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = ticket_price * 1.05, quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 2 WHERE film_screening_id = '98765432-ABCD-1234-5678-098765432100'
UPDATE film_screening SET available_seats = available_seats - 1 WHERE screening_id = '1a2b3c4d-1234-5678-9abc-def012345678'
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 20.50, customer_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE ticket_id = '5e6f7g8h-9876-5432-fedc-ba0987654321'
UPDATE film_screening SET available_seats = 50 WHERE screening_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET ticket_price = 15.99, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE ticket_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Film SET film_director = 'Steven Spielberg' WHERE film_id = 1;
UPDATE Screening SET ticket_price = 15.99 WHERE screening_id = 3;
UPDATE Film SET film_genre = 'Action' WHERE film_id = 1;
UPDATE Screening SET screening_date = '2022-09-05', ticket_price = 12.50 WHERE film_id = 1;
UPDATE film_screenings SET available_tickets = 50 WHERE film_name = 'Avengers: Endgame';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET sale_amount = 25.50, sale_date = '2022-08-15 14:30:00' WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE film_screenings SET available_tickets = available_tickets - 10, sold_tickets = sold_tickets + 10 WHERE screening_date = '2022-10-15' AND film_name = 'Avatar';
UPDATE ticket_sales SET sale_amount = 25.99, sale_date = NOW() WHERE screening_id = 101 AND ticket_number = 2001;
UPDATE Films SET ticket_price = 15.50 WHERE film_title = 'Avengers';
UPDATE Customers SET total_tickets_purchased = total_tickets_purchased + 2 WHERE customer_id = '0a501ac6-ab6e-4ab8-85dd-0153533de57b';
UPDATE Films SET screening_date = '2022-10-15', ticket_price = 15.50 WHERE film_id = '7b06064e-af40-4cf7-a3e4-14e9bb1fc029';
UPDATE Tickets SET ticket_total_price = 35.75, ticket_quantity = 3 WHERE film_id = '9ae4f3cd-d60c-4787-bf63-a3d5d43a7ff7' AND customer_id = 'd590e422-536b-409c-af0b-84d418556acd';
